QuestData.Title: Cave of the Blood Trial
QuestData.Description:
All Bloodtotem and distinguished guests must go through a trial of blood in the cavern beneath this outpost.
I hope it's a good sign that they wish you to participate in this rite of passage. You will need to show proof of your deeds, defeat a Warmonger in single combat, then perform sacrifice at an altar deep in the cavern.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place the Witch of the Wood's carcass on the altar and defeat a Warmonger in single combat.
QuestData.RewardText: They said an outsider would wield the Hammer of Khaz'goroth. I doubt you could even lift it.
